verses.verse: Children, <S%G5043><s%> obey <S%G5219><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> parents <S%G1118><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord: <S%G2962><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> right. <S%G1342><s%>

Honor <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother; <S%G3384><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> promise; <S%G1860><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> it may be <S%G1096><s%> well <S%G2095><s%> with thee, <S%G4671><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou mayest <S%G2071><s%> live long <S%G3118><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> ye fathers, <S%G3962><s%> provoke not your children to wrath: <S%G3949><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5216><s%> <S%G5043><s%> but <S%G235><s%> bring them up <S%G1625><s%> <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the nurture <S%G3809><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> admonition <S%G3559><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Servants, <S%G1401><s%> be obedient <S%G5219><s%> to them that are your masters <S%G2962><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> trembling, <S%G5156><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> singleness <S%G572><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> heart, <S%G2588><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> unto Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G2596><s%> eyeservice, <S%G3787><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> menpleasers; <S%G441><s%> but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> doing <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the heart; <S%G5590><s%>
With <S%G3326><s%> good will <S%G2133><s%> doing service, <S%G1398><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to men: <S%G444><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1437><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> any man <S%G1538><s%> doeth, <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G5124><s%> shall he receive <S%G2865><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> whether <S%G1535><s%> he be bond <S%G1401><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> free. <S%G1658><s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> ye masters, <S%G2962><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same things <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> forbearing <S%G447><s%> threatening: <S%G547><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Master <S%G2962><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven; <S%G3772><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> there respect of persons <S%G4382><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Finally, <S%G3063><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> be strong <S%G1743><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G2904><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> might. <S%G2479><s%>

Put on <S%G1746><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that ye <S%G5209><s%> may be able <S%G1410><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wiles <S%G3180><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> devil. <S%G1228><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2254><s%> wrestle <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3823><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> but <S%G235><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> principalities, <S%G746><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> powers, <S%G1849><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> rulers <S%G2888><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> wickedness <S%G4189><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> high <S%G2032><s%> places.

Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> take unto <S%G353><s%> you the <S%G3588><s%> whole armor <S%G3833><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye may be able <S%G1410><s%> to withstand <S%G436><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having done <S%G2716><s%> all, <S%G537><s%> to stand. <S%G2476><s%>

Stand <S%G2476><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> having your <S%G5216><s%> loins <S%G3751><s%> girt about <S%G4024><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having on <S%G1746><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> breastplate <S%G2382><s%> of righteousness; <S%G1343><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> your feet <S%G4228><s%> shod <S%G5265><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the preparation <S%G2091><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of peace; <S%G1515><s%>

Above <S%G1909><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> taking <S%G353><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> shield <S%G2375><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> wherewith <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye shall be able <S%G1410><s%> to quench <S%G4570><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fiery <S%G4448><s%> darts <S%G956><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> wicked. <S%G4190><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> take <S%G1209><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> helmet <S%G4030><s%> of salvation, <S%G4992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> which is <S%G3603><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>

Praying <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2540><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> watching <S%G69><s%> thereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> perseverance <S%G4343><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> saints; <S%G40><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> utterance <S%G3056><s%> may be given <S%G1325><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> that I <S%G1722><s%> may open <S%G457><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> boldly, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3954><s%> to make known <S%G1107><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> gospel, <S%G2098><s%>

For <S%G5228><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I am an ambassador <S%G4243><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> bonds: <S%G254><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> I may speak boldly, <S%G3955><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to speak. <S%G2980><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may know <S%G1492><s%> my affairs, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1691><s%> and how <S%G5101><s%> I do, <S%G4238><s%> Tychicus, <S%G5190><s%> a beloved <S%G27><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> minister <S%G1249><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> shall make known <S%G1107><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> all things: <S%G3956><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> I have sent <S%G3992><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the same purpose, <S%G846><s%> <S%G5124><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might know <S%G1097><s%> our affairs, <S%G4012><s%> <S%G2257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that he might comfort <S%G3870><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%>

Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to the <S%G3588><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love <S%G26><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that love <S%G25><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sincerity. <S%G861><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
